name: The Ignition Factor
overview: Challenge your arcade and strategic skills to eight levels of blazing excitement. Dodge exploding barrels, douse torrential fires, and rescue the trapped in an attempt to stave off one of nature's most powerful and destructive weapons - FIRE! The two part nature of the game allows you to strategically choose your firefighting equipment and gather information from the people trapped inside. If you can handle the pressure, you'll be celebrated by the entire town as the hero that you are.
